item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description:
Welcome to my new blog! After years of thinking about making a blog, procrastinating and ending up in an infinite loop, I have finally decided to make action.

The main purpose of this blog will be for me to share with you interesting things I have learned about in the past, and it will range from fancy math to productivity tools to exciting books I have read. So, expect a wide variety of topics!

Before we get started, let's write some exciting sample code:

def me(): 
    return "Brian"

Let's also write some math: $$ e = mc^2 $$
